price: Kuma sunã cẽwa: "Don me ba a saukar da wata ãyã ba a gare shi, daga Ubangijin sa?" To, ka ce: "Abin sani kawai, gaibi ga Allah yake. Sai ku yi jira. Lalle ne nĩ, tãre da ku, inã daga mãsu jira."
arabic: وَيَقُولُونَ لَوۡلَآ أُنزِلَ عَلَيۡهِ ءَايَةٞ مِّن رَّبِّهِۦۖ فَقُلۡ إِنَّمَا ٱلۡغَيۡبُ لِلَّهِ فَٱنتَظِرُوٓاْ إِنِّي مَعَكُم مِّنَ ٱلۡمُنتَظِرِينَ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wayaqūlūna lawlā unzila ʿalayhi āyatun min rabbihi faqul innamā al-ghaybu lillahi fa-intaẓirū innī maʿakum mina al-muntaẓirīna
